Author: sucre-pain
Text: I feel like I should add, I have ARFID too and I understand hating yourself for having the eating habits you do. And it’s a terrible feeling. You shouldn’t have to feel bad about eating.   If you want to talk about it at all, you can pm me.

Author: sucre-pain
Text: Jesus, I’m sorry.   It’s absolutely none of that dude’s business and he’s just being a complete ass. I don’t know if there’s anything you can do other than telling him to leave you the hell alone and that he’s being a douche. I would disregard anything he says because it has nothing to do with him.   I’ve dealt with friends, family members, and people I didn’t even know trying to “make sure I eat” and trying to make me to eat or try new foods and it’s so frustrating and such a pain in the ass. Just remember it’s truly none of their business and try to ignore them as best you can.   Good luck, and I hope it gets better for you :)
